name: Pinnacle Studio Project File
summary: Learn about .STX files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Pinnacle Systems initially developed Pinnacle Studio in the 2000s, which is when the software saved projects as STX files by default. However, Corel eventually acquired Pinnacle Studio in 2012 and replaced the STX format (along with the .SCN and .STU formats) with the AXP format.
Since AXP files replaced STX files, the files have become obscure. You will likely only encounter STX files if you are trying to open an old project.

instructions: While Corel replaced STX files with AXP files, you can still open STX files with Corel Pinnacle Studio (Windows). To open an STX file, select File â†’ Import previous Pinnacle Studio Projects.
Corel Pinnacle Studio can convert STX files to various file types, including the following formats:

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
